Posts.Content: I am HER-2 positive also. Herceptin can cause bone pain, my oncology nurse looked it up for me because I am having joint pain. The aromatase inhibitors are known for causing bone and joint pain. Have you looked into accupuncture? It really helps. Also, talk to you naturopath, they can recommend supplements and homeopathy items that can help reduce bone pain.Â
Posts.Title: Body pain after chemo tx and radiation
